createPersona_completion_explanation: Personal data that you add to your Persona will only be shared with dApps with your permission.
createPersona_explanation_someDappsMayRe: Some dApps may request personal information, like name or email address, that can be added to your Persona. Add some data now if you like.
createPersona_explanation_thisWillBeShar: This will be shared with dApps you login to
createPersona_introduction_subtitle1: A Persona is an identity that you own and control. You can have as many as you like.
createPersona_introduction_subtitle2: Personas are used to login to dApps on Radix. dApps may request access to personal information associated with your Persona, like your name or email address.
createPersona_nameNewPersona_subtitle: What would you like to call your Persona?
